diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Diplomatics.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    Diplomatics[Diplomatics] --> Foundations[Foundations]
    Diplomatics --> Methods[Research Methods]
    Diplomatics --> Applications[Applications]
    Foundations --> Theory[Theoretical Foundations]
    Foundations --> Practice[Practical Foundations]
    Theory --> Principles[Core Principles]
    Theory --> Concepts[Key Concepts]
    Practice --> Techniques[Techniques]
    Practice --> Tools[Tools & Methods]
